cause.description:
This complex genetic disorder typically causes low muscle tone, congnitive disabilities, behavioural issues and a chronic feeling of hunger that can lead to excessive eating and life-threatening obesity.
1. Early diagnosis is important because it could help children lead more productive lives through education and management of diet and exercise.
cause.mission: Our mission is to eliminate the challenges of PWS through the advancement of research.
cause.name: PRADER-WILLI SYNDROME
